markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Gallows Tooth](/Equipment.aspx?ID=214)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 567 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 100 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You attack an adjacent creature and haven't rolled your attack roll

**Requirement** You're a master in Intimidation
</row>

</column>

---

This grisly molar hangs from a cord threaded through a tiny hole just above its dried, exposed root. When you activate this talisman, the creature you’re attacking becomes flat-footed until the end of the current turn.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Gallows Tooth
